name: Contractors Torrance
tag_list: contractors-torrance, contracting-company-torrance, general-contractors-torrance-ca, licensed-contractors-torrance, professional-contractors-torrance, construction-company-torrance, home-remodeling-torrance, household-remodeling-torrance-ca, kitchen-remod
overview:
General Contractors Torrance

Contractors Torrance is a full service company specializing in bathroom and kitchen remodeling as well as home additions and all other types of services. Our general contractors are committed to client satisfaction which is reflected through our strong work ethic and integrity. The licensed contractors provide solutions to any type of construction and remodeling project.

Our general contractors spend an extensive amount of time researching new products and tools so that we can provide superior quality of products and services to our customers. Whether it’s a kitchen renovation or a bathroom remodeling job the contractors carry the right tools to properly execute the job in a timely and safe manner.

Some of our services are:

  • House Remodeling
  • Kitchens
  • Bathrooms
  • Plumbing
  • Floors
  • Windows
  • Railings/Fencing
  • Doors and Hardware
  • Walls and Ceilings
  • Patios/Decking
  • Driveways/Sidewalks

We know how stressful remodeling your property can be. Our licensed contractors will set with you and go over all the services they offer and help you select the one that is right for you. When choosing Contractors Torrance for your remodeling job, know that you are choosing a company with top-quality services and friendly staff members. You will be happy to know that we are the number one contracting service provider in all of Torrance.
